description: Detects the Internet Information Services (IIS) command-line tool, AppCmd, being used to list passwords
author: Tim Rauch
Janantha Marasinghe
name: Microsoft IIS Service Account Password Dumped
query: ((((process.executable.text:*\\appcmd.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"appcmd.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:*list\ *) AND ((process.command_line.text:(*\ \/config* OR *\ \/xml*)) OR ((process.command_line.text:(*\ \/@t* OR *\ \/text* OR *\ \/show*) AND process.command_line.text:(*\:\\** OR *password*)))))
